lines: One sweetly solemn tho’t, Comes to me o’er and o’er!
I’m nearer to my home today, Than e’er I’ve been before.
Nearer my home, Nearer my home,
Nearer my Father’s home, Where many mansions be!
Nearer the throne where Jesus reigns,
Nearer my going home, Laying my burdens down,
Leaving my cross of heavy grief,
